mapper.select: SELECT sk.seckill_id,sk.user_phone,sk.creage_time,sk.state, s.seckill_id AS "seckill.seckill_id", s.name AS "seckill.name", s.number AS "seckill.number", s.start_time AS "seckill.start_time", s.end_time AS "seckill.end_time", s.create_time AS "seckill.create_time" FROM success_killed sk INNER JOIN seckill s ON sk.seckill_id = s.seckill_id WHERE sk.seckill_id=#{scckillId} AND sk.user_phone=#{userPhone}
